content: Count Tatomir met with King Bolesław to discuss the rumors of an uprising in the northern parts of their kingdom. Count Tatomir urged the king to take swift action to prevent the uprising from spreading and causing further damage, expressing his concerns with a sense of urgency. The count's proposal focused on taking immediate measures to address the issue before it escalated beyond control. King Bolesław listened attentively and considered Count Tatomir's recommendations, indicating that he recognized the importance of this matter and was willing to take appropriate action.
